U

UNEXPECTED_DISCONNECT - Static variable in class Networking.ServerConnectionEvent
 
UNSUCCESSFUL_CONNECTION_ATTEMPT - Static variable in class Networking.ServerConnectionEvent
 
update() - Method in class GameComponents.Game
Resembles a "tick" in the game Moves snake, updates cell, sends updates to server, receives updates from server during this tick
update() - Method in class GameComponents.Snake
Moves and updates the snake's location accordingly Changes snake body and returns all cells changed Note: Detecting for hitting into a snake directly here is impossible for multi-player since need to first get other snake updates, but checking for out-of-bounds is done directly as it is not dependent on other snakes Thus the tail is directly changed on grid here, but the head is not and requires further handling
updateCell(Cell) - Method in class GameComponents.Grid
Updates the cell at that location Only used in multi-player
updateGoalScore(ScoreUpdateEvent) - Method in interface GUI.ScoreUpdateListener
 
updateGuiGrid(ArrayList<Cell>) - Method in class GUI.GamePanel
Updates the GUI Grid with the provided locations
updateOccurred(Cell) - Method in interface Networking.ServerListener
Cell update occurs and needs to be updated in GUI Only used in initialization phase
updateOccurred(ArrayList<Cell>) - Method in interface Networking.ServerListener
Cell updates occur and need to be updated in GUI Only used in spectate mode
updateReady() - Method in class GameComponents.Game
Used in ClientService Notifies game that update is ready and to stop waiting
